vote.text: Amendment SA 3828 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3828 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Murphy. (consideration: CR S6482; text: CR S6482) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3828 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
